rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with traditional Kerala motifs and a Vastu-compliant layout.
Spacious living room designed in the Nalukettu style featuring natural ventilation and ample light.
A well-equipped kitchen with an open layout for communal cooking, aligned eastward as per Vastu principles.
Master bedroom ensuring privacy and tranquility; positioned in the north-east quadrant following Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation.
A private bathroom with traditional Kerala design elements.
Modern study area integrated within the living space for work and relaxation.
A dedicated private gym with ample storage and traditional Kerala-inspired design.

openings.description: Main entrance facing the south for auspicious entry as per Vastu principles.
Service entrance leading to servant's quarters and storage areas.
Secondary entrance for additional access, ensuring balanced flow of energy.

servants_quarters.description: A compact servant bedroom designed to maintain privacy and efficiency in space usage.
Shared bathroom for servants quarters with essential facilities.

additional_features.description: A central open courtyard that enhances natural light and ventilation in keeping with Kerala architecture.
Traditional veranda space surrounding the living area for relaxation and social gatherings.
